mapper.select: SELECT YEAR || '-' || MONTH || '-' || DAY AS statDay, MERCHANTNAME AS sellerName, ITEMNAME AS productName, SUM(SUM_ITEM_PRICE) AS sumProductPrice, SUM(SUM_TAX) AS sumTax, SUM(SUM_TOTAL) AS sumTotal FROM TB_ITEM_STATS_DAILY WHERE YEAR = #{year} AND MONTH = #{month} AND DAY = #{day} GROUP BY YEAR || '-' || MONTH || '-' || DAY, MERCHANTNAME, ITEMNAME
